Short Course on Efficient Energy Management in Commercial Building
==================================================================

by [powerpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/powerpic/ "Posts by powerpic")
 | Mar 15, 2017 | [POWER](https://fke.utm.my/category/power/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Efficient-Energy-Management2.png)

![efficient-energy-management](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Efficient-Energy-Management.png)

Centre of Electrical Energy Systems (CEES), Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM) will be organising a Short Course on Efficient Energy Management in Commercial Building.  The objectives of this short course are to expose the participants to:

*   Energy Manager’s roles within an organisation.
*   Electricity tariff, load management, energy efficiency improvement of air conditioning system, power factor correction and energy saving potential in electric motor, transformer and lighting system.
*   Electrical energy audit methodology theoretically and practically.

The brochure and registration form can be downloaded [here](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2017/03/Brochure-Short-Course-on-Efficient-Energy-Management-in-Commercial-Building.pdf)
. 

You can book your seat by sending the registration form to cees@utm.my. All payment must be received within 14 working days before the event date.
